EmailTemplate.name: AU Request for proof of residence email - New
EmailTemplate.subject: WEX Motorpass application - Information regarding your application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for your recent application for a WEX Motorpass Account. In order to continue to assess your application we require a proof of residence to confirm your address. A proof of residence must have both your full name and your address printed on it.
We accept the following documents as a proof of residence:
National ID Driver's license Utility bill linked to the residential property, such as gas, electricity, water, internet, landline telephone not older than 3 months; Dated bank statement under a personal name not older than 3 months
You can scan your documents (PDF or JPEG file format) and send them as an attachment in your reply to this email. Alternatively, you can post a copy to us at WEX Australia Level 3, 293 Camberwell Road, Camberwell VIC 3124 or fax your document to 03 9274 9170.
Should you require any further information, please do not hesitate to contact me on {!User.MobilePhone}.
Kind regards,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
{!User.Title}
WEX Australia Pty Ltd.
Level 3, 293 Camberwell Road, Camberwell VIC 3124
T: {!User.MobilePhone}
E: {!User.Email}
W: https://www.motorpass.com.au/
